fields.name: Creative Commons Attribution
fields.description: This license lets others distribute, remix, tweak, and build upon your work, even commercially, as long as they credit you for the original creation. This is the most accommodating of licenses offered. Recommended for maximum dissemination and use of licensed materials.

fields.name: Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike
fields.description: This license lets others remix, tweak, and build upon your work even for commercial purposes, as long as they credit you and license their new creations under the identical terms. This license is often compared to “copyleft” free and open source software licenses. All new works based on yours will carry the same license, so any derivatives will also allow commercial use. This is the license used by Wikipedia, and is recommended for materials that would benefit from incorporating content from Wikipedia and similarly licensed projects.

fields.name: Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivs
fields.description: This license allows for redistribution, commercial and non-commercial, as long as it is passed along unchanged and in whole, with credit to you.

fields.name: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial
fields.description: This license lets others remix, tweak, and build upon your work non-commercially, and although their new works must also acknowledge you and be non-commercial, they don’t have to license their derivative works on the same terms.

fields.name: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs
fields.description: This license is the most restrictive of our six main licenses, only allowing others to download your works and share them with others as long as they credit you, but they can’t change them in any way or use them commercially.

fields.name: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike
fields.description: This license lets others remix, tweak, and build upon your work non-commercially, as long as they credit you and license their new creations under the identical terms.

fields.subject: New Submission

fields.value: The Press!
fields.name: press_name

fields.value: Footer
fields.name: footer

fields.value:
SUBMISSION PREPARATION CHECKLIST

As part of the submission process, authors are required to check off their submission's compliance with all of the following items, and submissions may be returned to authors that do not adhere to these guidelines.

  • The submission has not been previously published, nor is it before another press for consideration (or an explanation has been provided in Comments to the Editor).
  • The submission file is in the Microsoft Word, RTF, OpenDocument, or WordPerfect file format.
  • Where available, URLs for the references have been provided.
  • The text is single-spaced; uses a 12-point font; employs italics, rather than underlining (except with URL addresses); and all illustrations, figures, and tables are placed within the text at the appropriate points, rather than at the end.
  • The text adheres to the stylistic and bibliographic requirements outlined in the Author Guidelines, which is found in About the Press.

PRIVACY STATEMENT

The names and email addresses entered in this press site will be used exclusively for the stated purposes of this press and will not be made available for any other purpose or to any other party.
fields.name: submission_guidelines

fields.value:
This is a description block where information about this press can be entered. This text block should be replace with text pulled from a database setting at some point, though for now I don't really need it to.

This press has some specialities like publishing Alien Autopsy reports and April Fools reviews

BOOYA!
fields.name: description

fields.value:
Dear {{ review.user.first_name }} {{ review.user.last_name }},

__YOUR_MESSAGE_HERE__ Please log into the press web site to indicate whether you will undertake the review or not, as well as to access the submission and to record your review and recommendation. The review itself is due {{ review.due }}.

The Author has requested that this review be {{book.get_review_type_display}}.

Please notify us if you intend to undertake the review by clicking this link: {{ decision_url }}

Thank you for considering this request.

Sincerely,

Press Team

{% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature|safe }}{% endif %}

fields.value:
Dear {{review.user.profile.salutation}} {{review.user.last_name}},

This is a gentle reminder that we requested you review a book for us called {{book.title}}.

This review is due to be completed by {{review.due:date"c"}}.

If you are unable to undertake this review, please let us know.

Regards,
fields.name: unaccepted_reminder

fields.value:
Dear {{review.user.profile.salutation}} {{review.user.last_name}},

This is a gentle reminder that you agreed to review a book for us called {{book.title}}. This review is due to be completed by {{review.due|date:"c"}}. If you are unable to undertake this review, please let us know.

Regards,
{% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature|safe }}{% endif %}
fields.name: accepted_reminder

fields.value:
Dear {{review.user.profile.salutation}} {{review.user.last_name}},


This is a gentle reminder that you agreed to review a book for us called {{book.title}}.

This review is overdue, we requested that the review be completed by {{review.due|date:"c"}}.

If you are unable to undertake this review, please let us know.


Regards,
fields.name: overdue_reminder

Regards,

Dear {% if copyedit.copyeditor.profile.salutation %}{{copyedit.copyeditor.profile.salutation}}{% else %}{{copyedit.copyeditor.first_name}}{% endif %} {{copyedit.copyeditor.last_name}},

This is a request that you undertake copyediting on {{submission.title}}. Please login to the BMS, you will be directed to undertake your copyedit from the user dashboard.

Your username is: {{copyedit.copyeditor.username}}

Copyedits are requested to be completed by: {{copyedit.due}}.

Regards
{% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature|safe }}{% endif %}
